videos.description: During a fast-break attempt for UNC, Cameron Johnson goes up for the layup but gets denied by Louisville's Anas Mahmoud. Ray Spalding recovers the block and passes it to Quentin Snider who drains the 3-pointer for the Cardinals.
videos.headline: Louisville rejection leads to 3-pointer

videos.description: The Tar Heels start against the Cardinals on fire from the 3-point line, going 5-of-7 from distance.
videos.headline: UNC starts red-hot from deep

videos.description: Louisville's Deng Adel drives past UNC defenders and completes a crafty finger-roll layup with a flick of his wrist.
videos.headline: Louisville's Adel lays it in with flick of the wrist

videos.description: North Carolina's Cameron Johnson drives to the basket but gets completely denied by Louisville's Ray Spalding.
videos.headline: Spalding emphatically denies UNC attempt

videos.description: Louisville's Dwayne Sutton takes the ball from corner-3 territory, drives toward the basket and falls while putting up a left-handed, 2-point attempt which drops.
videos.headline: Louisville's Sutton goes all out for left-handed and-1

videos.description: North Carolina's Joel Berry II drives to the basket but due to being heavily guarded, decides to pass it backwards which luckily ends up in the hands of teammate Sterling Manley who sinks the easy layup.
videos.headline: Berry's no-look pass luckily leads to UNC points

videos.description: After Joel Berry II missed jumper, Louisville's Deng Adel plays it up to Ray Spalding who goes up for the dunk but gets stuffed by Joel Berry II who sprinted back on defense.
videos.headline: UNC's Berry makes up for miss with nasty chase-down block

videos.description: Joel Berry II, alongside his "bodyguard" Theo Pinson,  reflects on UNC's ability to share the ball and hit important shots to get their first ever win in Louisville.
videos.headline: Berry reflects on UNC's team-oriented victory against Louisville
